scripts.build: wp-scripts build blocks/carousel/index.js --output-path=blocks/carousel/build/ && wp-scripts build blocks/testimonials/index.js --output-path=blocks/testimonials/build/
scripts.start: wp-scripts start blocks/carousel/index.js --output-path=blocks/carousel/build/ && wp-scripts start blocks/testimonials/index.js --output-path=blocks/testimonials/build/
